thumb.title: [TAS] An Ordinary Sonic ROM Hack in 15:49.27 - CamHack (All Levels, Minimum Debug)
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qvf78B0XUq0以下説明文Now you can see all Sonic movements and buttons pressed when he is off screen !Some levels are impossible and only can be finished using debug mode.It's not possible to manipulate RNG's during a level when debug mode is activated, you will ever get the same peaceful time before Sonic.exe appears.This is a Tool Assisted Speedrun. For more information, visit http://tasvideos.org/Played by me (and Aglar too)!It's important to note that I used the Aglar's sonic 1 movie inputs on the first seconds of each act, until the level shows differences between the original game... and then, I played the rest!Game Description:A completely ordinary Sonic ROM hack, where nothing interesting happens at all. Nope. Nothing at all.. .. yeah right. It's time to P̣͇̽̓ͮr͎̞̗̫͚̠ͤ̀ͨ͑̃̅̾ͅa̢̤̤͔̞̠̒ͬ̍̃̌ͫ̇i͕͈͋̈͘s̟͎̘̗̙̻͆ͅe͕̭̫̦̖͆͌̓ͪͨ ̛̭̮̩̾ͧ̋̓͑̐̚H̉҉̥̣͙ȉ͕ͧͩ̈́ͯ̿̌m̭̻͚̟͉̹̊.̩̭̦̰̌͋̔͐ͧ͐̚͟This game is modified until Labyrinth Zone act 3, and it's similar to Sonic.EXE in various aspects.Star Light, Scrap Brain and Final Zone has not yet been modified.
